reviewText:
This DVD is easy to follow and full of useful tips and advice. If you want to market your business to thousands of customers and increase your profits dramatically, then this is the DVD to purchase.

Since purchasing the DVD, we have increased our sales by over 350%! I can't stress enough how important Twitter is to any business. It's free, so why not learn how to use it properly?

Tom does an excellent job in explaining how to harness it's full potential. Anyone can do it!

I highly recommend it to any business owner.

This is really a comprehensive insight into a tool i didn't realise existed,(I thought twitter was for geeks).I have already implemented some of the ideas in
this video and I can't thank tom enough

I highly recommend this dvd for any avid entrepreneur

First of all this is not a movie so I was already confused twice! I didn't really understand what Twitter was about and its not a film with a beginning middle and end. However it certainly has a script, characters (well one) and is educative. As a small business start up I was keen to learn about twitter and how it could be used to market my company products and I was intrigued by the title. And I can say in its favor I learn't a lot I sell cosmetic products online and using one thing i learnt from the dvd (the coupon method)has increased my sales by over 300% Highly recommend it Twitter Marketing For Your Business
